languages.text: Аделия Беллардо, внучка пирата Денза "Канистры" Беллардо, выросла в сметливого и предприимчивого капитана. Поскольку ее опекун, носивший прозвище Капеллан, знаком был лишь с верой, резней и делом пустотоходства, он посоветовал Аделии вложить наследство в приобретение корабля. Торговый клипер "Змея" облетел все заселенные миры Простора и множество неразведанных. За время капитанства Аделии Беллардо с ее судна не было сделано ни одного выстрела по мирным кораблям.

Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.
languages.original_text: Аделия Беллардо, внучка пирата Денза "Канистры" Беллардо, выросла в сметливого и предприимчивого капитана. Поскольку ее опекун, носивший прозвище Капеллан, знаком был лишь с верой, резней и делом пустотоходства, он посоветовал Аделии вложить наследство в приобретение корабля. Торговый клипер "Змея" облетел все заселенные миры Простора и множество неразведанных. За время капитанства Аделии Беллардо с ее судна не было сделано ни одного выстрела по мирным кораблям.

traits.locale_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, known under the moniker Chaplain, knew only three trades: faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Trade clipper Snake travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted. In all the time that Adelia Bellaro was a captain, not a single shot was fired from her ship at the civilian vessels.

Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Trade clipper Snake travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted. In all the time that Adelia Bellaro was a captain, not a single shot was fired from her ship at the civilian vessels.

Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Her trade clipper Snake travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellaro was captain, her ship never fired a single shot at civilian vessels.

Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. languages.text: 阿德莉雅·贝拉多，海盗“油罐”·丹兹·贝拉多的孙女，长大之后成为了一名机智而颇具活力的舰长。她的监护人是个被称为“牧师”的人，他一生中只了解三件事情——信仰、杀戮和航行，他建议阿德莉雅将继承来的遗产投资于虚空贸易。她的贸易快艇“毒蛇号”去过科罗努斯扩区所有的定居世界，还探索过许多未知世界。阿德莉雅·贝拉多担任舰长期间，她的舰船从来没向民用舰船开过哪怕一炮。
languages.original_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.

traits.locale_text: 阿德莉雅·贝拉多，海盗“油罐”·丹兹·贝拉多的孙女，长大之后成为了一名机智而颇具活力的舰长。她的监护人是个被称为“牧师”的人，他一生中只了解三件事——信仰、杀戮和航行，他建议阿德莉雅将继承来的遗产投资于虚空贸易。她的贸易快艇“毒蛇号”去过科罗努斯扩区所有的定居世界，还探索过许多未知世界。阿德莉雅·贝拉多担任舰长期间，她的舰船从来没向民用舰船开过哪怕一炮。

languages.text: Adelia Bellardo, die Enkelin des Piraten Kanister Denz Bellardo, wuchs zu einem schlagfertigen und energiegeladenen Captain heran. Ihr Vormund, von allen nur Ordenspriester genannt, kannte nur den Glauben, das Metzeln und die Raumfahrerei. Er riet ihr also, ihr Erbe in ein Raumschiff zu investieren. Ihr Handelsclipper, die Schlange, reiste zu sämtlichen besiedelten Welten der Ausdehnung und auch zu vielen unerforschten. In all der Zeit mit Adelia Bellardo als Captain feuerte ihr Schiff nie einen einzigen Schuss auf Zivilisten ab.
languages.original_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.

traits.locale_text: Adelia Bellardo, die Enkelin des Piraten Kanister Denz Bellardo, wuchs zu einem schlagfertigen und energiegeladenen Captain heran. Ihr Vormund, von allen nur Ordenspriester genannt, kannte im Leben nur drei Dinge: den Glauben, das Metzeln und die Raumfahrerei. Er riet ihr also, ihr Erbe in ein Raumschiff zu investieren. Ihr Handelsclippern Schlange reiste zu sämtlichen besiedelten Welten der Ausdehnung und auch zu vielen unerforschten. In all der Zeit mit Adelia Bellaro als Captain feuerte ihr Schiff nie einen einzigen Schuss auf Zivilisten ab.

languages.text: Adélia Bellardo, la petite-fille du pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, devint en grandissant une capitaine énergique à l'esprit vif. Son tuteur, un individu qui se faisait appeler simplement Chapelain, ne jurait que par la foi, le massacre et les voyages stellaires. Il lui conseilla donc d'investir son héritage dans un vaisseau. Son clipper de commerce, baptisé le Serpent, se rendit dans tous les mondes colonisés des Étendues et se posa sur de nombreuses planètes encore inexplorées, mais jamais Adélia Bellardo n'ouvrit le feu sur un vaisseau civil au cours de sa carrière de capitaine.
languages.original_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.

traits.locale_text: Adélia Bellardo, la petite-fille du pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, devint en grandissant une capitaine énergique à l'esprit vif. Son tuteur, un individu qui se faisait appeler simplement Chapelain, ne jurait que par trois choses dans la vie : la foi, le massacre et les voyages stellaires. Il lui conseilla donc d'investir son héritage dans un vaisseau. Son clipper de commerce, baptisé Serpent, se rendit dans tous les mondes colonisés des Étendues et se posa sur de nombreuses planètes encore inexplorées, mais jamais Adélia Bellardo n'ouvrit le feu sur le moindre vaisseau civil au cours de sa carrière de capitaine.

languages.text: Adelia Bellardo, nieta del pirata «Bidones», Denz Bellardo, creció para convertirse en una capitana astuta y enérgica. Dado que su guardián, conocido tan solo como Capellán, solo entendía de la fe, la masacre y la navegación por el vacío, la animó a invertir su herencia en una nave. Su clíper comercial, Sierpe, viajó por todos los mundos colonizados de la Extensión y también por muchos hasta entonces desconocidos. Durante toda su época como capitana, Adelia Bellardo no disparó ni una sola vez a una nave civil.
languages.original_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.

traits.locale_text: Adelia Bellardo, nieta del pirata «Bidones», Denz Bellardo, creció para convertirse en una capitana astuta y enérgica. Dado que su guardián, conocido tan solo como Capellán, solo entendía de la fe, la masacre y la navegación por el vacío, la animó a invertir su herencia en una nave. Su clíper comercial, Sierpe, viajó por todos los mundos colonizados de la Extensión y también por muchos hasta entonces desconocidos. Durante toda su época como capitana, Adelia Bellaro no disparó ni una sola vez a una nave civil.

languages.text: 海賊ジェリカン・デンツ・ベラルドの孫娘、アデリア・ベラルドは頭の回転が速く、はつらつとした船長に成長した。彼女を育てたガーディアンはただ教戒官と名乗った。彼は信仰、殺戮、虚空渡りのことしか知らなったため、アデリアに遺産でヴォイドシップを買うように勧めた。彼女の貿易用クリッパーであるスネーク号は、エクスパンスのあらゆる入植地へ向かい、さまざまな未踏の地にも赴いた。アデリア・ベラルドが船長を務めていた間、スネークが民間船に発砲したことははついぞ一度もなかった。
languages.original_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.

traits.locale_text: 海賊ジェリカン・デンツ・ベラルドの孫娘、アデリア・ベラルドは頭の回転が速く、はつらつとした船長に成長した。彼女を育てたガーディアンはただ教戒官と名乗った。彼は信仰、殺戮、虚空渡りのことしか知らなったため、アデリアに遺産でヴォイドシップを買うように勧めた。彼女の貿易用クリッパーであるスネーク号は、エクスパンスのあらゆる入植地へ向かい、さまざまな未踏の地にも赴いた。アデリア・ベラルドが船長を務めていた間、スネークが民間船に発砲したことははついぞ一度もなかった。

languages.text: Korsan Bidon Denz Bellardo'nun torunu Adelia Bellardo, büyüdüğünde pratik zekâlı ve enerjik bir kaptana dönüştü. Papaz adıyla tanınan velisi; inanç, katliam ve uçsuz seyahatinden başka bir şey bilmediğinden ona mirasını bir uçsuz gemisine yatırmasını tavsiye etti. Ticaret gemisi Yılan, Enginlik'te insanların barındığı tüm dünyalara ve hatta birçok haritalandırılmamış dünyaya seyahat etti. Adelia Bellardo'nun kaptan olduğu süre boyunca gemisi bir kez olsun sivil gemilere ateş açmadı.
languages.original_text: Adelia Bellardo, the granddaughter of the pirate Jerrycan Denz Bellardo, grew up to be a quick-witted and energetic captain. Since her guardian, who went simply by the name Chaplain, knew only faith, slaughter, and voidfaring, he advised her to invest her inheritance in a voidship. Her trade clipper, the Snake, travelled to all the settled worlds of the Expanse and to many uncharted ones as well. In all the time that Adelia Bellardo was captain, her ship never once fired on a civilian vessel.

traits.locale_text: Korsan Bidon Denz Bellardo'nun torunu Adelia Bellardo, büyüdüğünde pratik zekâlı ve enerjik bir kaptana dönüştü. Chaplain adıyla tanınan velisi, tek bildiği inanç, katliam ve uçsuz seyahati olduğu için, ona mirasını bir uçsuz gemisine yatırmasını tavsiye etti. Ticaret gemisi Yılan, Enginlik'te insanların barındığı tüm dünyalara ve hatta birçok haritalandırılmamış dünyaya seyahat etti. Adelia Bellardo kaptan olduğu bütün bu süre boyunca, gemisi bir kez olsun sivil bir gemiye ateş açmadı.
